parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.78

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Stored user text value in MFD, limit is 50, user0...user49

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[setUserMFDText]] [index, value]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle with MFD
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> value: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_vehicle [[setUserMFDText]] [0, "some text"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getUserMFDText]], [[setUserMFDValue]], [[getUserMFDValue]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
